message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,000?
Bob, I've tried to be flexible, but I need to get closer to my asking price. How about $9,500? This is my final offer.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $8,000, but that's as high as I can go.
